short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Let me fix your broken image!
short.de: Lass mich dein kaputtes Bild reparieren!
short.it: Lasciami riparare la tua immagine rotta!
short.ja: 壊れた画像を修正しましょう！
short.ko: 엑박이 뜨는 이미지를 제대로 보이도록 고쳐드립니다!
short.ru: Позвольте мне исправить ваше испорченное изображение!
short.th: ให้ฉันแก้ไขภาพที่แตกสลายของคุณ!
short.vi: Hãy để tôi sửa hình ảnh bị hỏng của bạn!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Chrome browser extension to fix broken images on websites.
Highly recommended to who frustrated by broken images on communities.

This extension uses multiple strategies to achieve successful loading of images which failed.
Loading image with same origin referrer header, request image with same domain, tries to get image with no request headers and so on.

You can select retry limiter count to restrict repeating counts for same image.
And also, using proxy option to prevent intercepting, blocking from some ISP or network router.
In this case, not only images load properly it'll bring better privacy and security on non-TLS environment.

———————————————————————————————————————

License notice

long.de,es,fr,it,ja,ko,ru,th,vi:
Chrome browser extension to fix broken images.

Features
 * Bypass blocked domain image
 * Bypass hotlink protection

---

이미지 깨짐을 방지해주는 크롬 익스텐션 입니다.

기능
 * 차단된 도메인 상의 이미지 우회
 * 일부 불펌 방지 우회
